analysis.description:
POSController.claims (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#842-845) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- claimTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#864-869)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#117-118) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#993-1034)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#330-353)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#424-439)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#442-460)
	- burn (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#640-653)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#524-528) is declared view but contains assembly code
TokenControllerBridge.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#1263-1267) is declared view but contains assembly code

POSController.doClaim (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#895-921) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balance == 0

POSController.doClaim (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#895-921) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balance == 0
POSController.getClaimRate (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#944-985) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- pow == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol:
	Contract POSController has payable functions:
	 - proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#875-881)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#264-282):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#279-280)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#281)
claimRate in POSController.doClaim (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#897) is a local variable never initialiazed

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#555-570) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#567-570)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#491) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#532-535)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#524-528)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#526-528

TokenControllerBridge.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#1263-1267)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#1265-1267
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#89)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.18', '^0.4.24']
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x0794ce7d4459105926da230f318c1e34bc790517.sol#653 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
